attributes.action: legislate that political cartoonists cannot portray Gordy "fatso" Brown as ROTUND
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Apparently, Gordy doesn't like the fact that Political Cartoonists have taken to portraying him as a shambling, jowled, grey hulk.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
